name: Dungeon Sprint 7DRL 2018
description: This is my entry of the 2018 7DRL challenge. I decided to improve on an existing game rather than create from scratch. I added a new dungeon generation system, cleaned up the UI a little and added procedurally generated items and mobs. I wanted to do more, but ran out of time. I didn't achieve all my goals, but still consider it a marginal success.
